modName: A Felicidade - Breton girl and a Mushroom followers.
summary: a Breton Girl and a Mushroom followers.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61614-5-1421035275.jpg[/img]


[size=3][[color=#00ff00]for those who want mushroom standalone...[/color]][/size]
see the mod as follows.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63315/]Mushroom Followers[/url] by appleofeden
of course, I have nothing to do with this one.


First of all, I'm not good at English, sorry.
and Second,
feel free to upload your screenshots.
I'm so glad to see it.


[youtube]jE2WL6IvKFo[/youtube][youtube]1ZBx7BtaV-Q[/youtube]

____________________________________________________________________

[About]
There're 2 followers in this MOD.
Both of them are standalone type, and Essential.


[color=#00ffff][size=3]Felicidade[/size][/color]
is a female Breton follower.
is Mage, as well Archer type.

[color=#00ffff][size=3]pino[/size][/color]
is a mushroom creature follower.
is Non-combat type.

(Especially, pino's resource is taken from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/]Vicn Creature Pack[/url] by Vicn.thx!)

____________________________________________________________________

[Location]
[color=#00ff00]Alchemist's Shack
[/color](south of Ivarsted)

[Body-type]
UNP
Height 0.90 / Weight 0.00

[Level]
10 - unlimited (PC sync)

[Combat style]
Custom (magic/archery)

[Marriage]
Yes.
(of course, pino not.)

____________________________________________________________________

[Recommended MODs]
as you like.
____________________________________________________________________

[Compatibility]
[color=#00ff00]incompatible with MODS replacing Alchemist's Shack.[/color]
____________________________________________________________________

[Attention]
Do not redistribute this MOD anywhere else.
Because it contains other author's resource.
____________________________________________________________________
